---
title: "Linear models"
---

### Learning objectives

- perform custom tests for model parameters (contrasts, tests of significance);
- obtain predictions from a linear model using software;
- understand the distinction between estimated mean and predicted values;
- test for equality of means in multiple (sub-groups) and also mean differences between groups with one or two factors.

### Content


- Course notes: chapter [4 (Linear regression models)](https://lbelzile.github.io/math60604a/linearmodels.html), Sections 4.3--4.4.
